node.title: ASI Marks 70th Anniversary
node.description: In this compelling Sabbath-afternoon program, history comes alive! We will explore the intriguing roots of ASI and span the time between then and now. We will see how ASI's vision and mission have expanded around the globe, and how this will most assuredly impact of God's work in the future, as well as your life-- if you will let it. You don't want to miss this program!
